author: wired blogs
text: date: tue 10/05/1999 9:44 am from: josh pyke (jpyke@tucker-usa.com)to: newsfeedback@wired.comsubject: mp3i think this is the most bullshit thing. ("burning cds the riaa way," 5.oct.99.) i have spent tons of money on cds and it is very wrong if they limit you on making mixes. they make enough money. i also think that it is wrong on the mp3 limits too. i love mp3s, and will keep doing as i please with them. they will never stop pirating, so they should just let it be. the people that are computer illiterate will spend enough money on cds to keep them happy. this whole subject boils down to money. they are just worried about losing money. well hey, that is the way it goes.
